subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, May 24 — In the first game of a three-game series against the Cardinals this week, Barry Bonds of the Giants lumbered toward Albert Pujols's sinking line drive in shallow left field but arrived after it landed. The ball skipped past Bonds for a double.
